Plot: Tigger goes looking through the hundred-acre-wood to find his family.
Title: The Tigger Movie
Writer: A.A. Milne (characters), Eddie Guzelian (story), Jun Falkenstein (screenplay)
Actors: Jim Cummings, Nikita Hopkins, Ken Sansom, John Fiedler
tomatoConsensus: Tigger Movie may lack the technological flash and underlying adult sophistication of other recent animated movies, but it's fun and charming.
